title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 372.6 - Authorization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 372.6 - Authorization

State Regulations
(a) A
State-prescribed authorization form shall be marked "EAF" to identify it as
emergency assistance to needy families with children when the application for
assistance is made by an individual family. (b) In situations of mass emergency, the
register of families applying for such emergency assistance (form DSS-880), when signed by the authorizing official, shall serve as the authorization of
such assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
372.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
